entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Configuration file is not applied when building for multiple platforms in .NET 7.0 and .NET 8.0 on macOS #40305

Closed

  • Error when working directory is drive root #38050
    8.0.4xx
  • Expression.New() validator throws exception on implicit conversion of structs to interfaces #40316
  • Workload install error - Unable to install maui workload on Windows - .NET 9 Preview 3 #40221
  • dotnet fsi does not support the DOTNET_CLI_UI_LANGUAGE environment variable: #40301
  • ApiCompat does not notice breaking change in generic constraints #39659
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #40327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #40324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Mention package references from dotnet list help at the top level #40317
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #40286
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update target branch #40145
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update loc branch target #40147
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • 4xx branding #40138
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Correct ETag and Content-Length computation, add more precision to quality definition #40321
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix dotnet fsi does not support DOTNET_CLI_UI_LANGUAGE #40302
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add APICompat support for checking generic constraints #40230
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • [Wasm] Remove workarounds #39689
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Use Ubuntu 24.04 Noble Numbat images by default starting in 8.0.300 #39614
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Select the first TFM when `run`ning a multi-targeted application #38995
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Prevent the Roslyn compiler package from being used on .NET Core MSBuild #39666
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Fix Workload Install Type Output for Other SDK Versions #39923
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    Area-Tools
